headline: Cencora (NYSE:COR) Sees Strong Q2 Earnings Surge; Declares US$0.55 Dividend
summary: Cencora (NYSE:COR) announced a notable 15% price increase over the last quarter, which coincided with substantial financial improvements as reported in its latest earnings release. The company reported growth in both sales and income, with second-quarter sales rising to $75.5 billion and net income increasing to $718 million, highlighting a strong performance compared to last year. Alongside this, the declaration of a quarterly cash dividend of $0.55 per common share likely reinforced...

headline: Cencora Reports Fiscal 2025 Second Quarter Results
summary: CONSHOHOCKEN, Pa., May 07, 2025--Cencora, Inc. (NYSE: COR) reported that in its fiscal year 2025 second quarter ended March 31, 2025, revenue increased 10.3 percent year-over-year to $75.5 billion. On the basis of U.S. generally accepted accounting principles (GAAP), diluted earnings per share (EPS) was $3.68 for the second quarter of fiscal 2025 compared to $2.09 in the prior year second quarter. content.title: Cencora Reports Fiscal 2025 Second Quarter Results
content.summary: CONSHOHOCKEN, Pa., May 07, 2025--Cencora, Inc. (NYSE: COR) reported that in its fiscal year 2025 second quarter ended March 31, 2025, revenue increased 10.3 percent year-over-year to $75.5 billion. On the basis of U.S. generally accepted accounting principles (GAAP), diluted earnings per share (EPS) was $3.68 for the second quarter of fiscal 2025 compared to $2.09 in the prior year second quarter.
